tool_description: Calculates exchange rates using historical data, trends, and multiple rate sources with statistical analysis.

calculation_method.description: Calculation method: spot, average, weighted, trend

historical_days.description: Number of historical days to include (1-365)

data_sources.description: Data sources to use for calculation

error_messages: Invalid currency pair: Both base and target currencies must be valid ISO 4217 codes and different from each other.
Invalid calculation method: Use one of [spot, average, weighted, trend].
Historical days out of range: Must be between 1 and 365 days.
No data sources available: At least one valid data source must be available.
Precision level error: Must be between 4 and 8 decimal places.
Insufficient historical data: Not enough historical data available for the specified period.
usage: Provide base_currency, target_currency, and calculation_method. Optionally set historical_days, data_sources, volatility_adjustment, and precision_level. Returns calculated exchange rate with statistical metrics.

confidence_score.description: Confidence score for the calculated rate (0-100)

volatility_measure.description: Volatility measure for the currency pair

data_points_used.description: Number of data points used in calculation
